Start Here¶

Requirements¶

Before adopting this feature, ensure you have downloaded the requied stack below using the pip-compile command:

click==8.1.3

# via neugs-utils (.pyproject.toml)

colorama==0.4.6

# via click

gradescope-utils==0.5.0

# via neugs-utils (.pyproject.toml)

pycodestyle==2.10.0

# via neugs-utils (.pyproject.toml)

Steps to Build the Docs¶

To replicate this project, follow these steps:

  1. Create and clone the Github repository neugs-utils

  2. Setup a virtual environment

  3. Install and setup Sphinx

  4. Create .rst files (corresponding to pages on your documentation) using a text editor of choice

  5. Push all files to Github
